ModMetaData.name: Better Sun Lamp
ModMetaData.author: ToyWalrus
ModMetaData.description:
A mod that changes the default behavior of the sun lamp and hydroponic basins.
Changes: * Sun Lamps - Increased radius - Doesn't turn off at night - Outputs much more heat * Hydroponic Basins - Decreased cost, allowing 16 basins and a Sun Lamp from a single Geothermal Power Generator - Plants in basins don't rest at night (growing 24/7!)
